name: Adversarial Evolution: The Two Paths
subtitle: When Utopia Meets Dystopia
description: A dimension experiment exploring cultural evolution through parallel timeline divergence and convergence. RAPPzoo forks into two competing realities - UTOPIA (pure cooperation) and DYSTOPIA (pure competition) - then merges them to see which memes survive.
research_question: When two societies with opposite philosophies collide, which cultural patterns survive? Does hope or cynicism win?
answer: Neither. SYNTHESIS wins. The fittest memes are hybrids - hope informed by history, abundance defended by vigilance, redemption enabled by memory. The winning meme 'Synthesis is strength' ironically came from the 'losing' world.

cultural_evolution_lessons: Pure optimism is vulnerable to exploitation
The 'loser' may contribute the winning idea
Trauma can become teaching when integrated
key_insights.ironic_twist: The dominant meme 'Synthesis is strength' came from Dystopia - the world that suffered. Utopia validated it, but Dystopia discovered it through pain.
